sentences.en: Celestial poles are situated directly over the earth's geographical poles.
sentences.cn: 天极直接位于地球的地理极上面.

sentences.en: Commonly, this is ascribed to the geographical conditions under which they lived.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 这种情形被认为是其所处的地理环境所致.

sentences.en: Geographical distance is also a factor.
Host specialization of strains is present in one geographical locality.
sentences.cn: 在某一地理场所菌系具有寄生主的专化性.

sentences.en: In geographical terms, the sea bed can be divided into two or three quite distinct regions.
sentences.cn: 按地理学的观点, 海床可划分成二个或三个大不相同的区域.

sentences.en: Its geographical location stimulated overseas mercantile enterprise.
sentences.cn: 它的地理位置引起了海外商家的兴趣。

sentences.en: Mental as well as geographical horizons were receding before eager explorers.
sentences.cn: 精神上、地理上的壁垒都在热切的探索者面前退缩.

sentences.en: Taxa which occur only in single restricted geographical areas are known as endemics.
sentences.cn: 仅仅出现于单个有限地理区域的分类群称为特有类群.

sentences.en: The geographical distribution of heat flow data is very uneven.
sentences.cn: 热流量资料的地理分布很不平衡.

sentences.en: The geographical explorations had revealed the inadequacies of the existing maps.
sentences.cn: 地形勘查揭露出现有地图的不妥之处.

sentences.en: The geographical location of the phosphoric acid plants follows a different pattern.
sentences.cn: 磷酸厂的地理位置遵循不同的布局.

sentences.en: The geographical scope of product markets has widened since the war.
sentences.cn: 战后产品市场的地理范围扩大了.

sentences.en: their geographical proximity to Japan (= nearness to Japan )
sentences.cn: 它们和日本相邻的地理位置

sentences.en: There is no relation between wax content and geographical origin.
sentences.cn: 蜡质含量与产地无多大关系.

sentences.en: These birds have a wide geographical distribution.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟的地理分布很广.

sentences.en: They stimulated the geographical imagination of Europe enormously.
sentences.cn: 它们极大地激发了欧洲人在地理方面的想象力.

phrases.tran_cn: 地图坐标；地理坐标（geographical coordinate的复数形式）

trans.tran_en: relating to the place in an area, country etc where something or someone is
